posts.post_title: FS: Cy Young glove shows HOF PSA 3 Price Reduced! Sale Pending
posts.post_content:
Selling this great Cy Young (HOF) w/Glove Showing PSA 3 Sweet Caporal 350/30. Asking $975 delivered w/insurance & tracking. PayPal FF to [url]rknight1@columbus.rr.com[/url] and email with any questions.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=357528&d=1561399912[/IMG]  [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=357529&d=1561399926[/IMG]
Thanks, I've had it for about 20 yrs. Hate to let it go.
